title: Neighborhood Produce Kiosk (COCO micro‑hub)
memo: A small, company‑operated kiosk inside busy neighborhoods that serves as a weekly pickup point for curated boxes. Run with a predictable schedule. Pilot with 1–2 kiosks, track footfall, box swaps, and waste reduction.
implementation: Pick 2 high‑traffic neighborhoods; map market days
MVP: SMS preorders + printed manifests; swaps tracked on paper then digitize
Metrics: on‑time pickups, swaps per box, leftovers

title: SMS Swap Assistant
memo: Let users reply to a pre‑delivery SMS to swap items (e.g., ‘swap tomatoes→carrots’). Simple rules, human‑readable confirmations, and cut‑off times.
implementation: Cut‑off T‑24h; generate picklist deltas for hubs
Notify ops dashboard for manual exceptions

title: Larry SMS Hub: Voice Reminder Templates
memo: Pre‑written, localized voice scripts (EN/Twi) for fee reminders and appointment follow‑ups. Text‑to‑speech + fallback SMS if missed call.
